1642440.name: Kleopatra
1642440.description:
"What does it take to forgive the unforgivable?"

"Perhaps the answer is time... a very, very long time..."

Kleopatra is a cyberpunk action RPG with arcade shooter combat and a bittersweet narrative about time and forgiveness.

Story

  • As Hatori, an imperial agent sent to the lawless asteroid city Kleopatra, you are tasked with a mission from a mysterious master: Find and capture Espada.

  • To complete your mission, you must shoot and slash your way through violent biker gangs at war over a strange, reality-warping substance named TDE.

  • Along the way, you will enlist the help of a bounty hunter named Klover and uncover past secrets which will call into question your master's motivations.

Gameplay

  • Quickly shoot and slash to clear all enemy waves before your health or time runs out.

  • Use abilities to slow down enemy attacks or dodge at the last moment to avoid damage.

  • Different enemy types will have their own attack patterns and defenses to break through.

  • Earn credits through bounties and shop for mods to create chain reaction attack combos.

  • Get higher bounty scores to unlock scenes with dialogue choices and fleeting romance.

Controls

  • The game can be played with mouse and keyboard or with gamepad.

  • Mouse and keyboard: Aim by moving mouse cursor over target.

  • Gamepad: Aim by selecting target with D-pad, works on Steam Deck.
